basics.name: Luca Di Marco
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer and Web Designer
basics.summary: With over a year in web development, I've made a mark by delivering projects exceeding client expectations. Passionate about this field, I constantly learn and grow, staying ahead with the latest trends and technologies. Projects like JOYAMATE (e-commerce platform, 250 monthly visitors) and AskBot (full-stack application, 500 monthly visitors) showcase my user experience focus and optimized code. Inspired by 'Mañana es mejor', I strive for improvement, embracing challenges as opportunities. I bring creativity, technical expertise, and a genuine love for tackling challenges to every project.

work.name: Askbot
work.summary: I'm the Lead Frontend Developer at Askbot, a startup that offers chatbot solutions, where I'm in charge of making our main webpage awesome:
highlights: Leading the design and development of our main webpage to make it look great and easy to use.
Handling all the design and code for the frontend, making sure everything works smoothly.
Using React and Tailwind to add cool and interactive features.
Making sure the website looks good and works well on all kinds of devices.

work.name: ADN Soluciones Web
work.summary: As a Frontend Developer at ADN Soluciones Web, I worked on making websites look good and easy to use:
highlights: Led the design and development of the main page
Achieved 100% responsiveness in web design across diverse devices and screen sizes.
Collaborated on three successful projects with a 100% on-time completion rate

work.name: SaTech / Country Club: El Tipal
work.summary: As an Assistant Software Engineer at SaTech, I significantly contributed to the Arduino-based security system's efficiency:
highlights: Contributed to designing, installing, and programming an Arduino-based security system.
Developed and enhanced software, resulting in a 20% improvement in system responsiveness.
Enhanced user understanding through the production of user manuals.

work.name: 7CAVAS
work.summary: I used to be the Web Content Manager at 7CAVAS. My job was to make sure our website was great:
highlights: Used my content management skills to make the website look better and easier for people to use.
Wrote cool stuff for the site, and more people started coming - 7% more!
Helped the website show up better on Google with SEO, and we got 5% more visitors from there.

awards.title: Best Final Project
awards.summary: Recognized by MindHub LA for outstanding final project (MyTinerary).

references.name: Sofia Brizuela
references.reference: Luca is a person committed to his work and a good partner. I had the opportunity to accompany him during his course at the Bootcamp Frontend Argentina Program 4.0 as his mentor, where I saw reflected his level and his ability to deal with projects in a self-taught way, always being present to help a colleague. I think she has great potential to continue growing in the IT field.

references.name: José Fernando Usui
references.reference: I met Luca Di Marco in Argentina Programa while we were studying together the Full Stack Developer course. From day one, I was impressed by his ability to understand the most complex concepts and his ability to apply them in practical projects.

references.name: Nahuel Andrés Montaner
references.reference: A genius Luca!, We attended the Mindhub bootcamp for frontend development in the framework of Argentina Programa 4.0, always with an incredible good vibe and willing to lend a hand when there was a problem with the code, explaining his points of view with a wide vocabulary but very easy to follow. Very responsible and meticulous with the work he delivered, and a tremendous intelligence to solve the requirements of the projects.

references.name: Nahuel Santiago Troncoso Raskovsky
references.reference: Luca is a very good partner, always contributing and helping with a lot of dedication and good communication. His designs and vision of aesthetics is very successful, in the bootcamp in which we coincided he showed very good logic when programming. Undoubtedly a very capable person in the area. I wish him every success!

references.name: Marcos Maidana
references.reference: Luca is a person that when he has an idea, he works until the end to carry it out and finish it. He is an exceptional partner, responsible and concerned about the progress of others, so that no one is left behind. Also, very creative and ingenious problem solver, he works in an agile and orderly manner. A great guy
